title: Growing old
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aging
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Old age
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Geriatrics - Psychological aspects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aged - Health and hygiene
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Old age
description: The problems presented by an aging population, illustrated by real-life case histories. The contribution of the welfare and medical services throughout Britain to the geriatric problem is emphasised, and the film touches on all facets of life among the elderly, including family relationships, economic factors and health.
